title: Electric offense helps Hokies blank Fordham, 12-0 - VT hokiesports.com
content: Electric offense helps Hokies blank Fordham, 12-0  VT hokiesports.com
description: Dropping eight of its 11 hits for extra bases on Friday, the Virginia Tech baseball team plated 10-plus runs for the third time through four games as the Hokies shut out Fordham, 12-0, at English Field at Atlantic Union Bank Park.
